full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I 'KHRID GZHUNG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYI ZHAL LUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
